Name: Forest
Description: A dense and mysterious forest, filled with towering trees and the sounds of wildlife. Sunlight filters through the leaves, creating a dappled pattern on the forest floor. The air is cool and fresh, and the scent of pine fills the air.

Connections.Village: To the south lies the village, a place of warmth and community.
Connections.Town: To the east stands the town, a place of warmth and community.

Actions.Name: Loot
Actions.Description: Search the area for hidden treasures.
